title: 156: Bach Nation Recap, Antiracism w/ Taylor Nolan, & Protesting w/ Craig Conant
itunes:title: 156: Bach Nation Recap, Antiracism w/ Taylor Nolan, & Protesting w/ Craig Conant
description:
TW: Violence towards Black people is discussed in the last 30 minutes of this episode.
The Broads spend the first half of the episode discussing some of Bachelor Nation happenings, specially those coupled with Black Lives Matter - they chat about Chris Harrison, Ben Higgins, Hannah Brown’s “second” apology, Bekah and Garrett Y’s Instagram confrontation, the other Garret’s post, and Jess’ battle with “being” performative. They are then joined by the amazing TAYLOR NOLAN (host of podcast “Let’s Talk About It”) to discuss being performative, being antiracist, and much more! And lastly, our special front lines protest reporter, comedian Craig Conant, stops by and comes in HOT talking about the numerous protests he has attended, what he has seen of looting and police brutality at the protests, some history lessons, and more! 
*Chatty Broads will only have ONE episode a week until the week of July 6th to give Bekah a little more down time in her final days of pregnancy and post birth. Join next Tuesday as The Broads recap episode 2 of “The Bachelor: Greatest Of All Time”.
TAYLOR NOLAN:
Instagram: @taymocha
Podcast: “LET”S TALK ABOUT IT” - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lets-talk-about-it-with-taylor-nolan/id1321043863
Episode mentioned in the podcast is “White People”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lets-talk-about-it-with-taylor-nolan/id1321043863
Craig Conant: 
@craigpconant 
Podcast: “COMMUNITY SERVICE”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405
FOLLOW US HERE:
CHATTY BROADS: @chattybroads
BEKAH: @bekah
JESS: @thebaddmom
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** FIGHT CAMP: To try Fight Camp for 30 days, just go to JoinFightCamp.com/CHATTY (http://joinfightcamp.com/CHATTY)
*** POLICY GENUIS: If you are looking to buy life insurance right now but not sure where to start, head to POLICYGENIUS.COM (http://policygenius.com/)
*** CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TakeCareOf.com/chatty50 (http://takecareof.com/chatty50) and enter code chatty50
*** SKILLSHARE: Get 2 free months of Premium Membership at Skillshare.com/ (http://skillshare.com/) CHATTY
*** HELIX: Helix is offering up to 200 dollars off ALL mattress orders and two free pillows for our listeners at Helixsleep.com/ (http://helixsleep.com/) CHATTY.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
